content.title: Intro
content.content:
vomentienguo is a Telerin word.[1]

Helge Fauskanger has suggested that it corresponds to the English phrase "of our meeting".[2]

content.title: Examples
content.content: ēl sīla lūmena vomentienguo ("A star shines upon the hour of the meeting of our ways")[1]

content.title: References
content.content:
